website_summaries.verdict: Solid desktop tower computer at a low price with a DVD optical drive and a 1 TB hard drive.
pros: Contains all of the features you’d expect to find in an Acer desktop computer, just at a lower price point
Combination of 10 USB, HDMI, and VGA ports is handy
Includes support for Bluetooth 5.0 and latest Wi-Fi protocols
Unlike some desktop computers, it has a DVD drive
With 1 TB of hard drive space, you’ll be able to save a lot of photos and videos
cons: Processor is an Intel Core i3 model, so it’s not quite as powerful as some others

customer_reviews.title: Computer came with malware preinstalled
customer_reviews.text: Received it on Saturday. Box was factory sealed. On first power up and initialization, DID NOT DOWNLOAD ANYTHING. Firefox was already installed- that was odd. Opened Firefox for the first time and discovered phishing malware already present. Look guys, I know it was only $399 but I expect WAY better from Acer.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Very economical computer. I wanted to use it for gaming, but I had to make other upgrades to it. It really can't run origin games. It would crash trying to run some of them, other the quality was really low and it would lag. But, the good news is that there's plenty of room to add a large graphics card and extra RAM stick in the case. It has two extra spots for hard drives too, one of them being attached to the dvd optical drive though. I've had it for a few weeks and I've had no problems. Good computer choice for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Evan Michael Klein

customer_reviews.title: THis PC has turned into a joke.
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of usage, and approximately 5-6 times weekly, this machine takes an average of 6-9 minutes to boot up. It's ridiculous. This is my first Acer and it will be my last. I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this machine. There are i3 7100 based machines that are more expensive and the i3 8100 is a huge upgrade as the 8th gen Intel CPUs jumped to four cores. It even outperforms four core i5 7400 based machines. Add in the 16GB of optane boost and you can't beat this machine in a pre-built. It is only a hair slower in booting and loading programs than my SSD equipped machine. I added a $25 4gb RAM stick for 12GB total and dual channel capability. Needs a dedicated GPU if you plan on gaming and the keyboard and mouse leave a lot to be desired but overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GARY D POOVEY

customer_reviews.title: Internet didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Would not stay connected to Internet. Operated for about a minute then disconnected from service. Worked about 6 hours reconnecting and trying different settings. Would not always reconnect and never for more than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Worth About What You Pay
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a tough weekend work-out. As a bare bones simple business computer it's fine, ACER keyboard is very cramped but it is definitely fast enough motherboard. The video card is very disappointing, I have old XP machines that do better with movies and rendering websites than this machine. I also have an ACER TC-780, which seems a much better performer in several respects, and competently trouble free - which is why I bought a back-up ACER. I'm betting is will be a long-term solid, yet simple, work machine for docs and spreadsheets...but I don't expect much more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: don't buy this. when I logged in, it took minutes to open explorer. now, I have a perfectly fine working macbook connected to wifi, and my chrome browser is stuck with gmail unloaded. that means both computer quality and wifi are low quality. additionally, with just chrome, nearly 50% of the cpu power is used from task manager. makes no sense and the specs are a bunch of crap. bought alone, they would be $200 or $300 but because it's packaged and retail in a case, it is $400. still, no one should buy this and expect anything but frustration. it's a shame they even sell this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modified operating system, preinstalled malware in Firefox.
customer_reviews.text: So far the hardware seems ok. You are FORCED to create a Microsoft account. NO option for creating an offline account. Tried reloading windows with usb iso, says no disk drive found, load drivers. Used my microsoft account to get started, went back, created offile account, deleted the account I was FORCED to start with. Deleted all bloatware. We'll see how it goes. Another reviewer commented that it had Firefox, Acer said no it doesn't, YES IT DOES!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN ABSOLUTE PIECE OF CRAP TO MUCH TO TYPE. MY ADVICE DO NOT BUY THIS COMPUTER.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Acer Aspire TC-885-ACCFLi30
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this unit a few days ago. I've had my Prime account for 13 years or so and now this computer is not available to ship to me? I just want to say it is a great basic computer with plenty of memory. You will be very happy with the purchase. Windows 10 installed with Norton Security free for 30 days which is nice since I run Norton already throughout all our systems I just added my key code and it updated the NIS so I scanned system and it came up clean and Wi-Fi is operating flawlessly. Wish I could buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Will The Thrill

customer_reviews.title: Decent computer for mother in law.
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law is in the habit of installing whatever browser extension, screen saver, and other nonsense she sees. So she has always had problems with her computers. We bought this for her so she'd be able to at least check her emails and facebook. She's happy, and it was cheap, so we're happy. This would NOT be a good gaming computer.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: No stars. It did not work. Spent all Sunday with tech support. They wanted me to send it in for repair. It was brand new! Just took it out of the box. I tried to return it for a refund. Amazon tech chatted with me. Was supposed to have UPS pick it up from my house. Never happened. Tried to return it again on Amazon. Wanted me to take it to UPS myself. Only gave me credit on an Amazon gift card instead of a refund on my Amazon credit card that I paid it with.
customer_reviews.author: A-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: best computer for money that I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This isn't some powerful computer for gaming, but if you want something that can run windows 10 and can be used for internet and watching movies then there is nothing better than this for the price. They did the smart thing and went for a higher speed hard drive. That means that your boot times and general responsiveness of the computer will be a lot better without extra cost. The computer has never had a single technical issue and the build quality and case design are great. Buy this computer!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Can't log on to my account!
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday and it ran for about an hour! Set it up, added my email and added another user. Now the only account that will open is the extra one I added. My account is dead! It's not a administrator account so I can't do anything. Going to try and get some help or return it. Not very happy!
customer_reviews.author: .41 AE

customer_reviews.title: Great basic computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer but I use it for basic functions (You Tube, pictures, online browsing, etc). I purchased several refurbished computers (even different models) to return them. I made sure this one wasn't refurbished! It is fast and I am very happy with it. For the price and my needs, I couldn't be happier. Also, I love Acer. My laptop is Acer, going on 5 years and still outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Spread the Word

customer_reviews.title: New PC for my mom
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good budget computer. Was glad to see the Optaine memory combined with a large magnetic drive - seems like it was sufficiently performant. It had Norton and Dropbox offers on it at boot. Firefox was preinstalled too. Otherwise not much bloat. Wanted to post some pictures of the inside and such. There are two open slots for expansion cards, and the 8 GB of memory was in one of the two memory slots. So lots of future expandibility.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A. McKeeth

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: First, it's a very visually appealing desktop. I was replacing a HP Slimline PC that quit after the last power outage. It setup in no time at all. Looks to be very quick for what I need (emails, spreadsheet, internet surfing, pictures). Glad the desktop wasn't cluttered with programs I don't want but they are loaded. So far the most annoying thing is Norton asking to upgrade. For the money looks to be a very capable PC...recommend if you don't want to spend over $500
customer_reviews.author: BettyBoop

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: A lot of computer for the price. Smaller than old desktop. Plenty of outlets, but could use another USB on front. Up & running with no problems. Windows 10. Cons: Windows 10. Cheap, flimsy, piece of junk DVD mounted vertically. Already snags when closing, no excuse for this, optical drives are too inexpensive to put in this piece of junk. Would have been 5 stars with a decent drive, I almost gave it just three because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Bob

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: for basic web browsing and email it should do fine. i use Sling TV and the app pixelates badly when in full screen mode. will probably need to purchase a video card to fix this down the road. setup was fast and trouble free and it is quiet. Lots of features. like the two HDMI ports.
customer_reviews.author: Stumpy

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is a piece of crap. Since May of this year when I bought it, it is now down for the 4th time. WiFi no longer works, and the problem is not my WiFi network/internet. Another computer and tablets work fine. I bought it because Amazon had a special pay-per-month special. Boy am I really Sorry I bought this P.O.S. Do yourself a Favor and stay away from Acer garbage. Had an Acer monitor once that was also crap.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Sinkler

customer_reviews.title: Good PC
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new desktop after several years. Tried this one and like it. First time with Windows 10. As I learn more, seems to be a good setup. It connected to my old monitor and printer no problem. The system seems to find the necessary drivers it needs. Impressive. I had no problem with the keyboard and mouse that are in the box. I feel it's a good value once you connect everything and become familiar with it.
customer_reviews.author: Con-sue-mer

customer_reviews.title: Fast, inexpensive and great value
customer_reviews.text: Our home desktop hard drive gave it up and we opted to get a new W10 box that wasn't a gamer but fast enough for our everyday need. This ACER model was the exact computer we needed at a great price, plus we paid it off in 4 payments It came right up and we were back to home computing , and most importantly, internet functional, again. Allowed us to easily reload our lost sites, virus protection, etc, with no need for tech advice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all around desktop computer
customer_reviews.text: Shipped as said. Packaging was great. Set up was very fast. Restart is incredibly fast. So far no issues at all, works perfectly. I would have to say the 8GB RAM is amazing in this i3, absolutely no reason for me to have spent anymore money on an i5 for much more money which would have really had no noticeable difference in performance unless you ran it side by side...and even then you wouldn't notice much. 1 TB of storage is huge as well. Absolutely the best deal out there for a desktop computer for general usage, not for 3D gaming or anything that requires higher performance. I will be buying another one at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. From day one I was having problems, drivers out of date and poor performance. I contacted customer support and was told " We are aware of the problem, but we are not working on it at this time" ( A driver update needed by Windows 10). While the unit is NOT a gaming computer, I keep getting a " Application cannot access graphics." This usually shows itself when scrolling through Facebook and I lose my graphics and photos on the page.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Pdavaan

customer_reviews.title: Reliable affordable computer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gamer , nor do I use my computer for business. Acer makes a reliable computer. My last one lasted 6 years and never had a major problem. The only downside to my old one was the fan had problems but that is fixable and can be minimized with an additional mini an on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: N. McBride

customer_reviews.title: Great Home PC
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, plenty of USB ports, fastest Home PC I've ever encountered although it has Windows 10. I don't really care for Windows 10, still learning how to navigate it. I don't do gaming so I have no idea how it would work for that. I research a lot and watch You tube. I recommend highly to anyone looking for a good home PC.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: Thought I would try Acer for a change
customer_reviews.text: We keep our PC's on 24/7 and so far this PC has been great. I bought it for my wife and she loves the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Paulgro

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far!
customer_reviews.text: Super value Windows 10 home computer. Just got it setup today and its working great so far. Setup was easy, internet is working flawless and the Bluetooth and WiFi was also tested and seem to be working fine too. Its not a gaming machine but the addition of a better video card would fix that, just remember its only got a 300 watt power supply so don't go overboard by trying installing a huge 2 fan monster video card, it likely won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Gee

customer_reviews.title: Solid, new GPU is a must for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Threw in my Rx 550 and 550w PSU and it's working like a charm. Most of my games run flawlessly on max settings. If you want to do vr gaming, aim for like a RX 590 or a GTX 480. The processor is good enough without upgrading it so you can save money there. Maybe invest in a bit more memory if you plan on streaming or something of that nature. Pretty solid set up just by adding another 400 worth of parts.
customer_reviews.author: Marquel Rogers

customer_reviews.title: good unit but some documentation not clear
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded the user manual which has details but is missing a clear picture of the front and back panels. And on the front of the actual unit, all the markings for what things are are in dull grey on black and quite small. on the back they are so tiny you can't see things like the arrow that points away from the input or toward the input for audio.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Bad image config from acer
customer_reviews.text: PC was slow had issues with graphics looking bad WiFi would slow down, wasn't running like this config of hardware should. So i went to put a clean copy of Windows 10 on it but to do so, the Intel optaine had to come out as Windows could not see the HDD. To get to nvm slot is a monumental pain, you basically have to remove everything inside the computer. Once i had a clean copy of Windows 10 installed and proper drivers fro Wifii and GPU etc this computer runs great. Acer really to step up there QA department and make sure everything works.
customer_reviews.author: Opas C5

customer_reviews.title: Does Everything I Need
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my old computer, Ive been hanging onto for 10-11 years, when the Windows Vista system it was operating on finally slowed down so much it would take almost 10 to boot up. I have had no issues with this computer doing what I need it to do. Running on Windows 10, I cut my waiting time for booting, downloading, opening documents by at least 6X the wait I was waiting on the old computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mykal Gotti

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I liked the reviews and so purchased this model. It has been an excellent computer and there have been no problems in the first several months. The setup was flawless and easy as I switched over from my old computer to this one. I would recommend it for good quality and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

customer_reviews.title: Works right away
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play for sure. Had to make an emergency replacement. Hooked this up to two monitors and my external hard drive. I moved my MS Office subscription over and was up and running in less than 30 minutes. Hooked up and restored my files from Carbonite overnight and was totally recovered by morning. Delivery was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote Griller

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: Just set it up and so far, so good. Much faster than my two-yr-old Dell. My only complaint is the lack of an indicating light to show hard drive read/write activity
customer_reviews.author: Scrapiron

customer_reviews.title: Already sound like the disk drive is having problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the kids to do school they specifically need a disk drive. Its already making noise when you put in a disk. I'm not sure how long this will last.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tisdell

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: Like any new computer, this machine works fine. The real value-for-money with any computer isn't evident until later. Will it last more than two years? When will the hard drive fail? Will Windows get so bogged down that it is practically unusable? Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Shuts down in the middle of anything that is being done. It always comes back to lock screen, never stays in screen saver mode. Have not had any luck with Acer backing their product. Stay away from buying computers from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Donald White

customer_reviews.title: Acer as expected
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid since deployment with basic-requirement retirement aged heavy user. The hardware combination in the grand Acer tradition is even pretty good at smoothing out Windows 10 flaws, so few blue screens or other foibles. Keyboard and mouse included was decent.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Very good comp.
customer_reviews.text: Great and fast computer, I really like it, first time buying Acer and I Am sold.
customer_reviews.author: V.D.

customer_reviews.title: 3 months Later
customer_reviews.text: The unit comes with two HDMI ports which is the primary reason I bought it and now only one works. It just gave way-no damage to it whatsoever, barely even used and stopped working. Hence my 3 star rating. Hopefully the other one continues to work!
customer_reviews.author: Electrosocket

customer_reviews.title: I AM VERY PLEASED WITH THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: IF SOUND QUALITY IS A PRIORITY ,YOU WILL LIKE THIS COMPUTER.I DON'T LIKE WINDOWS 10 BUT THE ACER IS GREAT.I JUST RETURNED A DELL THAT SOUNDED LIKE A TRANSISTOR RADIO I HAD WHEN I WAS TEN.SO I WAS PLEASED WHEN MY EARPHONES MET YOUR SOUND.GOOD JOB.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: Being Installed
customer_reviews.text: My old computer, same make and model has served me well. This is the same with the 10 version needed
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Acer aspier
customer_reviews.text: I got my Acer TC-885 and have it all set up I got it to replace my old unit that was windows 7 this new computer is very fast and was very easy to set up it took about an hour to transfer my files from the old computer and about an hour to fully set up I use it for day to day home use bills and shopping on line it's great i'm very happy with it and if anyone is looking for a fast home set up this is it and it's a very good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived late and damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The key board spacebar is jammed no doubt from shipping. The memory board had fallen out and I had to have a tech reinstall it. It now works fine but the keyboard needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: trickie1

customer_reviews.title: on time delivery
customer_reviews.text: Set it up let the updates do their thing added what I needed to the MS software. fast reliable and such a nice change from the old laptop. With the 32 inch screen. What a difference. Thank you for the timely delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Weber

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to edit and store my photos it has 2 HDMI outputs so I have 2 monitors I know it's not a gaming computer but I plan to see it can handle my old steam games so far I've had no need to contact tech support
customer_reviews.author: John T Amor

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this for gaming. I just use it at home for bill paying and going on the internet. Starts up fast. Pretty good value for the money. Had a acer aspire before and it lasted for 5 years. It still works but not as much memory.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice PC for a very good price. Purchased on Prime day so saved money. Using the PC for general purpose. Overall an excellent machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: U2

customer_reviews.title: My first Acer
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have been pleasantly surprised with the performance of my new Acer Computer. It was priced right, had the features I wanted and is big enough & fast enough with enough space on it to meet my needs. Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for my girlfriend who uses it like a TV and performs work functions, the other for my daughter who's addicted to Youtube and seek and find games. I have no complaints what-so-ever. For our needs, these are perfect. The price was also very agreeable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Koscak

customer_reviews.title: So fer, no problems
customer_reviews.text: Much faster than my 7 year old Gateway. My malware scan used to take about a half hour. Now it takes about three minutes.
customer_reviews.author: leo hargreaves

customer_reviews.title: Bulky tower, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: The CPU is about twice the size of what I had before, but it performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desktop in June and just finally got it set up. Checking the system, only 8GB RAM shows and not the added 16GB Optane for the 24GB total. I bought this computer to BROADCAST wifi but instead it searches for wifi. And, there was another surprise. I was checking optimization and defragment tool and low and behold it said no optimization and Solid State was there. I was supposed to get a regular 1TB hard Drive. Anyone who can help with this machine is greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Sue G.

customer_reviews.title: Good PC at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this PC for a small home business. Meets all of those requirements. I do not game on it so have no idea if it is well suited for that. For small business, basic internet surfing & emails it is more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: J. Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Out of Warranty when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this computer it seemed to already have a virus, which I had to pay to have cleaned up. Recently, I was having a problem with it and when I checked with Acer, I found that the warranty had expired in July 2019. I bought it in October 2019. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elginjacki

customer_reviews.title: garphics
customer_reviews.text: garphics are good but not for gaming . my other acer has intel garphics but windows 10 would not load the driver right. this acer works good all the drivers work. For price you get a good computer
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Speed
customer_reviews.text: This computer has great speed! I do a lot of multi-tasking and need to be able to go in-between applications as quickly as possible. I have not come across any problems so far with the system.
customer_reviews.author: Kick Mom

customer_reviews.title: great computer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far great computer for the price. Very fast clean crisp monitor all working very well so far I’ve only had it a week but I love it
customer_reviews.author: Farmer1060

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say anything about gaming , we got this for my husbands mom and dad and they love it , That's all i can say .
customer_reviews.author: RS & JS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Computer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Prime Day. Shipping was on time, works perfect as of today. Easy to set up, using for normal household stuff, printing, scanning and banking.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Good value, thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Suits my needs. Use it for web development. It's performed admirably since I got it. nice little upgrade to what I had before. cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Nethawk

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, really good speed, especially considering it's an I3. I don't do heavy gaming so this pc seems perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: James M Thompson

customer_reviews.title: unhapopy
customer_reviews.text: any chance of returning this. OR swarping it out for another computer ,used or new I don`t care ? it does not fill my need. \Ted Tedeco
customer_reviews.author: TED TEDESCO

customer_reviews.title: brokenq
customer_reviews.text: had to return unit the box was damaged when i got unit and the case and computer were broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: V good
customer_reviews.text: Computer was very good but choose the SSD memory option it’s a little bit more efficient and quieter for same price. Either way it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan gordon

customer_reviews.title: NO BLUETOOTH AUDIO STREAMING
customer_reviews.text: a bit sluggish but otherwise good, DOES NOT SUPPORT BLUETOOTH AUDIO STREAMING FROM YOUR PHONE
customer_reviews.author: shee bee

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Goes right to what I want it to go to. We just use it for streaming and documents. And surfing the net.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Brother very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother. He said it's working perfectly. Easy to set up. He chose this over an H/P.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PC for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my teenage son. He's given it a solid thumbs up. All I need to know.
customer_reviews.author: zengoof

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I personally do not like Intel but this is a nice machine in a tight package. For my needs it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Willey

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan with light use
customer_reviews.text: Motherboard or power failure after less than a year. Hit power button with no response. No symptoms before this complete fail.
customer_reviews.author: Matthewmayhem

customer_reviews.title: Great as an office computer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our college's librarian. It works fine, as expected. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Gunn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The computer has done great so far no complaints, I do not do gaming so I don't know about that. For the money works as well if not better than my Dell XPS.
customer_reviews.author: terry dailey

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT DESKTOP PC
customer_reviews.text: MY OLD DESKTOP WAS ALMOST 9 YEARS OLD SO I NEEDED SOMETHING BETTER. IA AM VERY SATISIFIED WITH MY DECISION TO PUCHAASE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dee Cowdery

customer_reviews.title: Dead
customer_reviews.text: This PC work well for nearly a year but before the 12 moth where up, die, I believe the power box is burn, so is in a box now.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: bad computer
customer_reviews.text: for home use stop working nov24 2019 60 days over to return item
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Worth the money. Would recommend : )
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: it's super fast
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it tossing out my infor + passwords on it, and syncing it's stuff onto my husbands'
customer_reviews.author: GailMaryJo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value.
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. Like having 2 HDMI and plenty of USB. Runs fast. No setup issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love this
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many computers and this is by far the best one.
customer_reviews.author: punk

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping & a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping & computer is perfect for what i need it for...there is nothing i do not like about it.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like Acer. Have used their products for 20 years. Never had problems. They built a solid machine. I use it mainly for word processing, e-mail, photo editing. I am not a gamer. Gamers should get the machines Acer recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Ruyter

customer_reviews.title: Acer PC just OK
customer_reviews.text: Everything works, but the CD/DVD drive is a bit cheesy. It doesn't eject all the way. The case is bigger and bulkier than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel P. Glankler

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase So Far!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the performance of this low budget unit. I will reevaluate after adding RAM
customer_reviews.author: MM CO

customer_reviews.title: No Problems
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a few days and no problems. Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B _ JAX FL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Internet PC
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an older failing pc my father was using, this is a wonderful "upgrade" boots fast and does everything he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for gaming
customer_reviews.text: It is a very capable PC the only thing I would change would be to upgrade the graphics card
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the money
customer_reviews.text: I did not use Tech Support Because this Computer Works great
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hafner Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the basics that I need.
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10, and all I need for a few bucks. Works great if you need it for the basics.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sharp

customer_reviews.title: <60 days; dead in the water
customer_reviews.text: windows 10 update, then nothing. Now it just spins and says "Diagnosing your PC" . UPDATE: On one hand, ACER support was able to "help". On the other hand, I had to wipe all my files.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F Welch

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it brand new and broke within two weeks. It maybe had 15hrs of run time max. Then Amazon sent me a replacement that was a REFERBUISHED one and so I returned it and they still didnt refund me all of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Support not good. Make sure you know how long Amazon has had item. Acer has the 1 year warranty and they count it from Amazon's purchase date not yours!! I would't recommend Acer to the Taliban!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Richards

customer_reviews.title: Terrific item!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Easy to operate. Great value for the price. It fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Nita Smith

customer_reviews.title: Price and Specs
customer_reviews.text: Good hardware in good price, works fine with major softwares. Good speed.
customer_reviews.author: karan savaliya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family computer
customer_reviews.text: We use this Acer for our home station and it's fast and perfect for anyone and any age. Good buy for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Seamless Transaction
customer_reviews.text: What I needed, when I needed it, at the right price, and timely delivered. Seamless purchase & intro in every possible way.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL DONNELLY

customer_reviews.title: A great computer at a very reasonable cost!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is perfectly priced. It does what it promises to do without costing an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Healy

customer_reviews.title: Acer computer
customer_reviews.text: have not used tech support have not used it for gaming. we are happy with the overall product
customer_reviews.author: Terry the farmer

customer_reviews.title: Computer
customer_reviews.text: Computer was delivered on time and product was as advertised. I was well pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: c3markh
